data.name: Boat basshead 100
data.description: Let go off all your troubles and sink into the sound that brings your soul back to life. Let the BassHeads 100 fix your head, and get your mind in the game. Live in the Vibe. Control the flow of your audio zone with just a tap. Take a call and end it with just a tap. Solve all your problems with just a tap! boAt brings you easy solutions with great sound. Plug Into Convenience with the 3.5 mm angled jack to begin your journey.

data.name: Boat basshead 225
data.description: Innovative housing design enables for easy adjustment and optimal wearing comfort with powerful 10mm drivers for sonic clarity, bass-driven stereo sound and good attenuation of ambient noise. The noise-cancelling microphone enables trouble free receiving of calls or undeterred sessions of musical extravaganza.Made to fit you and your lifestyle, providing a smooth grip for an extra secure and comfortable fit for your ears

data.name: Boat basshead 400
data.description: With 40mm Drivers get ready to immerse in HD auditory experience with super extra bass to get the day going. Plug into your rhythm with style via the wireless Bluetooth headset and carry the vibe wherever you go. Stay immersed into Nirvana for extended durations with a playtime of up to 8 hours

data.name: Boat Rockerz 245
data.description: Beast Mode for Gaming- It’s time to up your game and tune into Rockerz 245 Pro wireless neckband that comes equipped with our low latency BEAST Mode, the perfect set up for your gaming and binge watch sessions.

data.name: Boat Immortal earbuds
data.description: boAt Immortal 121 TWS Wireless Gaming in Ear Earbuds with Beast Mode(40ms Low Latency), 40H Playtime, Blazing LEDs, Quad Mics ENx Signature Sound, ASAP Charge(10 Mins= 180 Mins)(Black Sabre)

data.name: Philips Audio 245
data.description: RICH BASS CLEAR SOUND: Quality 10mm dome type driver units built with innovative sound-absorbing holes deliver powerful deep bass, making the sound more layered, allowing you to clearly feel Instrument sounds and vocals.

data.name: Zebronics Zeb-Bro
data.description: Zebronics Zeb-Bro Bar 1500 is an elegant and sleek soundbar with a glossy finish that can add visual beauty to your home. For exceptional audio quality, this sound bar is equipped with dual 5.71 cm powerful drivers.Stream audio via Bluetooth with the quality sound produced by this soundbar of 20W high power output.

data.name: Boult Audio Z25 Wireless
data.description: Experience non-stop music bliss with our wireless earphones that boast an impressive 32 hours of playtime on a single charge. From your morning commute to extended travels, these earbuds will keep you entertained throughout the day, ensuring your favorite tunes are always within reach.

data.name: bOat STone 352
data.description: Get ready to be enthralled by the 10W RMS stereo sound on Stone 352 portable wireless speakers.with a speaker that offers an IPX7 marked resistance against water and splashes, you can enjoy your playlists across terrains in a carefree way. Charging Time About 1.5-2 hours.The speaker offers up to a total of 12 hours of playtime per single charge at 60% volume level with Bluetooth Range of 10m

data.name: JBL Go 3
data.description: Enjoy signature JBL bass without any distortion. Feather light, ultra-portable grab-and-go design.IP67 water-resistant and dust-resistant: Engineered to withstand splashes and sand.Experience your music and movies without any lagging with Bluetooth 5.1’s Insta-sync.Mega Playtime: One single charge = upto 5 Hour battery backup under optimum audio settings.

data.name: Infinity - JBL Glide 120
data.description: Beast Mode for Gaming- It’s time to up your game and tune into Infinity - JBL Glide 120, in Ear Wireless Earphones with Mic, Deep Bass, Dual Equalizer, 12mm Drivers, Premium Metal Earbuds, Comfortable Flex Neckband, Bluetooth 5.0, IPX5 Sweatproof wireless neckband that comes equipped with our low latency BEAST Mode, the perfect set up for your gaming and binge watch sessions.

data.name: PTron Fusion One
data.description: 14W Loud & Clear Sound: Fusion One portable Bluetooth speaker Soundbar comes with 2 full-range 52mm speakers to produce 14Watt output to create an Immersive Stereo Sound Experience.Long Battery Life: Up to 20 Hours of Stereo Sound playback time on TF card mode. Thanks to its Large rechargeable built-in battery.Portable Design with 10 RGB Patterns: This wireless soundbar is easy to carry around in your backup. It comes with 10 different LED light patterns; you can customise the lights for perfect vibes.
